alert.note: Alert for Columbus; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 8:05PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Pender, Bladen, east central Robeson and northeastern Columbus Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 804 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of showers capable of producing gusty winds near Bladen Community College, or 10 miles northwest of Elizabethtown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Rowan, Bladenboro, Lake Waccamaw, Sandyfield, Boardman, Penderlea, Point Caswell, Bladen Community College, Ammon, Butters, Council, Currie, Wards Corner, The Borough, White Oak, Riegelwood, Carvers, Smiths and Abbottsburg. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 389 and 391. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
